metadata.synopsis: This is dialogue played by the ward device placed on the wall in Devil's Fee. This AD will be played when player enters the trap and trap explodes.This will be played every time the explosion happens which is repeated.
metadata.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AGoto -47 11Enter the area near the door.

0.text: Is it warm in here? Or is it HOT.
0.context: NodeContext: Delighted in a gleeful way, then very sinister on 'Now burn'
